Package index

rbibutils overview

rbibutils-package rbibutils
Read 'Bibtex' Files and Convert Between Bibliography Formats

Convert bibliography files

bibConvert()
Convert between bibliography formats
readBib() writeBib() charToBib()
Read and write bibtex files
readBibentry() writeBibentry()
Read and write bibentry files

S3 class bibentryExtra

Manipulate objects from class ‘bibentryExtra’

bibentryExtra() as.bibentryExtra() `[[`(<bibentryExtra>) `[[<-`(<bibentryExtra>) `[`(<bibentryExtra>) `$<-`(<bibentryExtra>)
Work with 'bibentryExtra' objects

Other

rbibutils_formats
Supported bibliography formats
register_JSSextra()
Create and register bibstyle JSSextra
